name.ja: アティプスの<ruby>蟲<rt>こ</rt></ruby><ruby>惑<rt>わく</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2+ monsters, including a Plant or Insect monster
This Link Summoned card is unaffected by Trap effects. "Traptrix" monsters you control gain 1000 ATK while you have a Normal Trap in your GY. Once per turn: You can target face-up cards your opponent controls up to the number of Insect and Plant monsters you control; negate their effects (until the end of this turn), then you can banish 1 Normal Trap from your GY, and if you do, destroy 1 of the face-up targeted cards.

materials: 2+ monsters, including a Plant or Insect monster

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Forest of the Traptrix
